name: To the Depths (selcidia)
description:
A small idle game, based thematically on the old Dungeon Keeper games.

You take on the role of a young dungeon core, growing their dungeon from nothing. You can expand your dungeon and unlock powerful minions who will help defend your vulnerable core from marauding adventurers.

This is my entry for My First Game Jam, and is my first game. I hope you enjoy it.
Thanks for playing.
